name: Pale Blue Dot
description:
Pale blue dot is a peaceful game of exploration.

You are an alien drone, travelling through space. Ping to find signals around you, they will reveal pieces of our past. Resonate with the words from the past by filling in the blanks.

Type the words to fill in the missing pieces and move towards the signals.

You have travelled far, fuel is a major concern. Plan your route with care, more difficult signals may get you further than the less complex ones would!

Find the source of these signals.

Good luck.

p.s. If you get too stuck, wait around a while, words may appear to prompt you in the right direction.

Headphones recommended.

This is a game made in 48 hours for the 22nd gm48 game jam
